name: BlazBlue Centralfiction
description: Combining 2D fighting game and visual novel, the BlazBlue series has been supported by many fighting game fans. The latest installation, BlazBlue: Centralfiction, serves as the ending to the Azure Saga and reveals the truth that has ever been in mystery.
content:
game:
  appid: 586140
installer:
- task:
    app: quartz
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: devenum
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: wmp9
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
winesteam:
  overrides:
    dinput8: native,builtin
    xinput1_3: native,builtin
  xinput: true
